page.title: 10Clubs in Saline Fife
page.content: The villagers,adults and children alike,are well catered for in Saline. The children may join a variety of clubs including the Boy's Brigade,Brownies,Guides and Rangers. Boys interested in football may join the Comrie Colts. The School offers after-school clubs for children who want to play short tennis,learn cycling proficiency,play computer games,make models and enjoy handcrafts. The female adults in the village may join a Young Wives Group,Women's Guild,Women's Rural Institute or Mother and Toddler's Group. The ladies are also catered for in night classes,where ladies aerobics have a good following.The remainder of the night school classes on offer are intermediate French,beginner's German, keep fit for men and healthy eating.
